title: KKR 2012 Trophy
description: The 2012 Indian Premier League final was a day/night Twenty20 cricket match on 27 May 2012 at the M. A. Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai, which was played between Chennai Super Kings and Kolkata Knight Riders to determine the winner of the 2012 season of the Indian Premier League, an annual Twenty20 cricket tournament in India.

title: KKR 2014 Trophy
description: Kolkata Knight Riders defeated Kings XI Punjab by 3 wickets to win the 2014 Indian Premier League in a high intensity final match, which was played in flawless spirit between the top two teams.

title: KKR 2024 Trophy
description: Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) secured their third IPL title by defeating Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) in a thrilling final of the 2024 IPL season. KKR posted a formidable total of 208/7, powered by Andre Russell's explosive 64 off 25 balls and Phil Salt's steady 54 off 40. Despite Heinrich Klaasen's valiant 63 off 29 for SRH, KKR's Harshit Rana held his nerve in the final over, taking crucial wickets and ensuring a 4-run victory for KKR. This win ended a decade-long title drought for KKR, who had earlier dominated SRH in Qualifier 1, continuing the trend of Qualifier 1 winners clinching the trophyâ€‹.
